text: Gerald Monroe Rafshoon (born January 11, 1934) is an American television producer and political operative. He is one of the four founding members of Unity08, and was the White House Communications Director under the presidency of Jimmy Carter from 1978 to 1979.Mr. Rafshoon's White House Exit Interview conducted by David Alsobrook of the Presidential Papers Staff. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:American television producers Category:Living people Category:White House Communications Directors Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
